channel.title: CVE Feed for Teradata -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Teradata -- all products

item.title: CVE-2016-7488|2024-08-06T01:57:47.655Z -- teradata -- virtual%20machine%20community%20edition
item.description: Teradata Virtual Machine Community Edition v15.10 has insecure file permissions on /etc/luminex/pkgmgr. These could allow a local user to modify its contents and execute commands as root.

item.title: CVE-2016-7490|2024-08-06T01:57:47.636Z -- teradata -- studio%20express
item.description: The installation script studioexpressinstall for Teradata Studio Express 15.12.00.00 creates files in /tmp insecurely. A malicious local user could create a symlink in /tmp and possibly clobber system files or perhaps elevate privileges.

item.title: CVE-2016-7489|2024-08-06T01:57:47.656Z -- teradata -- virtual%20machine%20community%20edition
item.description: Teradata Virtual Machine Community Edition v15.10's perl script /opt/teradata/gsctools/bin/t2a.pl creates files in /tmp in an insecure manner, this may lead to elevated code execution.
